file.name: sp_admin_spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: kearch specialist search engine admin API
  description: kearch specialist search engine admin API
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: '{scheme}://{sp_host}:{port}/sp/admin'
    variables:
      scheme:
        enum:
          - http
          - https
        default: http
      sp_host:
        default: localhost
      port:
        default: '32600'
paths:
  /login:
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: username
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: password
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
  /logout:
    get:
      summary:
  /update_password:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                required: true
                password:
                  type: string
                password_again:
                  type: string
  /init_crawl_urls:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                required: true
                urls:
                  type: string
                  example: www.google.com\nwww.facebook.com
  /learn_params_from_url:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                required: true
                topic_urls:
                  type: string
                  example: www.google.com\nwww.facebook.com
                random_urls:
                  type: string
                  example: www.google.com\nwww.facebook.com
  /learn_params_from_dict:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Dict'
  /update_config:
    post:
      requestBody:
        description: Designated configs(connection_policy, host_name or engine_name) are updated
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                connection_policy:
                  type: string
                host_name:
                  type: string
                engine_name:
                  type: string
  /approve_a_connection_request:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                required: true
                me_host:
                  type: string
  /delete_a_connection_request:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                required: true
                me_host:
                  type: string
  /send_a_connection_request:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                required: true
                me_host:
                  type: string
components:
  schemas:
    Dict:
      properties:
        language:
          type: string
        use_default_dict:
          type: string
        topic_dict:
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: number
            format: integer
          example: {'lisp': 91}
        random_dict:
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: number
            format: integer
          example: {'OCaml': 91}

Error: unmarshal: json: line 1:5: callback: json: cannot unmarshal bool into Go value of type ogen.Schema
